titleStmt.title: A letter from a friend to the wise and learned, in England, Scotland, France, and Ireland

publicationStmt.publisher: printed in the year 1680, by Tho. James, according to the mind, will, and desire of the author, for the publick good of all nations, being the fruit of his meditation for England's great honour, riches, and glory,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
